From: "dcoburn" <dcoburn@...>

From: dcoburn@...

	Skulletron was just getting some fresh air outside of the Alliance base. 
After a while, he went inside.  (Note that I didn't say back inside, I just
said inside because he reached the Alliance base but hadn't entered yet)
Skulletron had come to see Zardus for some orders.  Skulletron rushed to
the conference room, where he saw, Sound Wave!

	"Hey, yo!  Sound Wave!  Where the hell is Zardus?  I need orders!  I crave
war, I crave bloodlust!!!!"
